text: What if high schools reserved senior year for students to figure out what they want to be   TL DR at end  So here s my plan  days in a school year    periods a day   You can do like internships or research projects during those periods  At the beginning of the year  you choose the careers you may be intrested in and you get to rotate through them like little terms  Each  term  lasts   weeks  or exactly   days  and at the end of each class  you can decide whether it is something that interests you   I feel like we get plenty of core clases in the   years we go to school  It is oddly unreasonable for students to just  figure out  what they are interested in  Switching majors in college is more difficult and expensive   Possible problems  funding these classes or finding ways for students to try them  It would have to be some sort of online program or connection to the community college since these classes would each be crazy small  You would probably also have to pair up with other districts around   However  I feel like this would be super beneficial to students who dont really know what they want to do  and I would love it so so much   Let me know what you think TL DR  senior year would be dedicated to having students rotate through   week classes that help them learn what they want to do  It could be run online or connected to the community college
